mapper.insert: insert into Registration(id, doctor_id, patient_id, status, visit_date) values (#{id}, #{doctor_id}, #{patient_id}, #{status}, #{visit_date})
mapper.update: update Registration set doctor_id = #{doctor_id}, patient_id = #{patient_id}, status = #{status}, visit_date = #{visit_date} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, doctor_id, patient_id, status, visit_date from Registration where id = #{id}
select id, doctor_id, patient_id, status, visit_date from Registration where patient_id = #{patient_id} order by visit_date desc
select id, doctor_id, patient_id, status, visit_date from Registration where patient_id = #{param1} AND visit_date = #{param2}
select id, doctor_id, patient_id, status, visit_date from Registration where doctor_id = #{doctor_id}

select id, doctor_id, doctor_name, doctor_title, dep_no, dep_name, patient_id, patient_name, patient_sex, patient_age, patient_birthdate, status, visit_date from registrationview where patient_id = #{patient_id} order by id desc

select id, doctor_id, doctor_name, doctor_title, dep_no, dep_name, patient_id, patient_name, patient_sex, patient_age, patient_birthdate, status, visit_date from RegistrationView where patient_id = #{patient_id} order by id desc limit #{page.start}, #{page.size}

select id, doctor_id, doctor_name, doctor_title, dep_no, dep_name, patient_id, patient_name, patient_sex, patient_age, patient_birthdate, status, visit_date from registrationview where doctor_id = #{doctor_id} AND visit_date between DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND NOW() order by case when status = 1 then 0 else 1 end, case when status != 1 then id end desc;

select id, doctor_id, doctor_name, doctor_title, dep_no, dep_name, patient_id, patient_name, patient_sex, patient_age, patient_birthdate, status, visit_date from registrationView where visit_date = #{param1} AND patient_id = #{param2} AND status = 1
